sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Scripts to update reference qualifiers and default values on demand table</description> <name>DemandCoreTokyoUpgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of DemandCoreTokyoUpgrade , time : "+start); var demandCoreTHelper = new DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper(); demandCoreTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnDemand('business_unit'); demandCoreTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnDemand('department'); demandCoreTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnDemand('business_unit'); demandCoreTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnDemand('department'); var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of DemandCoreTokyoUpgrade , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for DemandCoreTokyoUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-06-23 06:48:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a23c1485eb1011105509b5bf1a5228a0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DemandCoreTokyoUpgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Demand Core" source="com.snc.demand_core">0a005a2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4346</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a23c1485eb1011105509b5bf1a5228a0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-06-24 05:17:52</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
